snippet: Mr. Bush’s strategy is risky given how low he has fallen in polls and that several other rivals, like Marco Rubio and Chris Christie, are ahead of him in early voting states.
abstract: Jeb Bush is ramping up his strategy of questioning whether Donald J Trump is fit for presidency in wake of Bush's own aggressive performance in Republican debate in Nevada; Bush's campaign has decided that strategy both emphasizes Bush's seriousness and shows that he can be bold.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bush’s strategy is risky given how low he has fallen in polls and that several other rivals, like Marco Rubio and Chris Christie, are ahead of him in early voting states.

headline.main: Jeb Bush, Sensing Momentum After Debate, Zeroes In on Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: Sensing Momentum After a Combative Debate Performance, Bush Zeros In on Trump
